artist: Artist: Natori Shunsen; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait of figure with wrinkled face and long hair, wearing multicolored floral kimono
markings: red artist\'s seal: 春仙 {Shunsen}; publisher seal: 渡辺工 {Watanabe kō} (work of Watanabe); LLC, artist\'s hand-applied red approval seal: 名取 {Natori}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with embossing
portfolio: From Creative Prints: Collected Portraits by Shunsen (Sōsaku hanga: Shunsen nigao-e shū 創作版画　春仙似顔画集)
text: Thirteenth design of a set of 36. Based on Nakamura Utaemon V as Yodogimi in the scene Hoshiigura of the play Hototogisu kojō no rakugetsu 沓手鳥孤城落月　糒庫 (A sinking moon over the lonely castle where the cuckoo cries), performed at the Kabuki Theater, June 1925.
title: Actor Nakamura Utaemon V as Yodogimi
